Inherit : CWC Laundry Entry Inherit Author : Siel Date : January 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/shops/bank.h, /include/vault.h and /include/money.h

Method index

check_customer(string, object, string)
set_laundry_exit(string, mixed, string)
Used to set the exit from the laundry entrance room into the laundry itself.
set_laundryowner(object)
This is the object that is the owner of the laundry.
set_location(string)
This function is used to set the location used for calculation of which currency the laundry owner will accept.
set_visit_cost(int)
This is used to set the cost of a visit to the laundry (in monetary units)

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
check_customer
int check_customer(string verb,
object thing,
string special)
set_laundry_exit
void set_laundry_exit(string direc,
mixed dest,
string type)
Used to set the exit from the laundry entrance room into the laundry itself. The parameters are just like those of add_exit.

Parameters:
direction - The direction of the exit.
dest - The destination object. Usually the filename of the destination.
type - An exit type as in add_exit.
Returns:
void
See also:
add_exit .c
set_laundryowner
void set_laundryowner(object ob)
This is the object that is the owner of the laundry. This should be an NPC.

Parameters:
laundryowner - The owner NPC object.
set_location
void set_location(string str)
This function is used to set the location used for calculation of which currency the laundry owner will accept.

Parameters:
location - The name of the location.
set_visit_cost
void set_visit_cost(int i)
This is used to set the cost of a visit to the laundry (in monetary units)

Parameters:
cost - The cost of a vist
